definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: But it's wonderful to contemplate this cluster of stars on a winter night.
sentences.chinese: 但在冬夜，注視這個星團顯得如此美妙。

sentences.english: The brightest reddish stars in the cluster are ancient red giants.
sentences.chinese: 星團中最明亮的微紅色恆星是遠古的紅巨星。

sentences.english: This brilliant engineer and droid technician operated out of the Minos Cluster.
sentences.chinese: 這位才華橫溢的機器人工程技師在米諾斯星團外工作。

sentences.english: The blue-white stars are the hottest in the cluster.
sentences.chinese: 藍白色的恆星則是星團中最熱的。

sentences.english: The program manages all the samples coming back from the Stardust probe.
sentences.chinese: 該程序管理着星團探測器所返回的所有樣品。

sentences.english: Its glowing edge indicates that it is being photoionized by the hottest stars in the cluster.
sentences.chinese: 它增長中的邊界顯示其正被星團中的熱星光致電離。

sentences.english: Globular clusters have some of the oldest stars inthe universe.
sentences.chinese: 球狀星團中有很多宇宙中最古老的恆星。

sentences.english: Below and to Antares' right is the globular cluster Messier 4.
sentences.chinese: 在心宿二右下方是球狀星團M4。

sentences.english: Theblue-white stars are the hottest in the cluster.
sentences.chinese: 藍白色的恆星則是星團中最熱的。

sentences.english: The origin of wide binaries may be capture during cluster dissolution.
sentences.chinese: 這顆遠距雙星有可能是在星團解體時被捕獲的。

sentences.english: Maybe globulars go on forming whenever conditions permit.
sentences.chinese: 也許在條件適當時，球狀星團便會不斷地形成。

sentences.english: Globular clusters once ruled the Milky Way.
sentences.chinese: 球狀星團曾經統治着銀河系。

sentences.english: Brightclusters and nebulae abound in the northern constellation of Auriga.
sentences.chinese: 御夫座北部有大量明亮的星團和星雲。

sentences.english: Studying globular clusters therefore tells us about the history of our galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 因此，研究球狀星團可以向我們揭示銀河系的歷史。

sentences.english: I heard about a winking star in the Pleiades.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說昂宿星團裏有個眨眼的星星。

sentences.english: The Order just like the Pleiades and the Pleiadians is not from this time space zone.
sentences.chinese: 它和昴宿星團都不來自於這個時空區域。

definition: Europa (moon of Jupiter), aka Jupiter II
asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter
Sagittarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Vega, brightest star in constellation Lyra 天琴星座
